payload.name: model-theoretic-semantic
payload.core: Reason by constructing/analyzing models that satisfy a theory; determine what is true in all models vs some models.
proc: check which statements hold in models

diff.vs_proof_theoretic: builds worlds where statements hold/fail rather than deriving via rules; focuses on structures making statements true

fail.desc: mathematical model satisfies theory but diverges from real system in important ways

ex.scenario: checking if a security policy is consistent
ex.approach: construct a model where all policy rules hold; if none exists, policy is inconsistent
